p DAVID BOLLAND
Personal Details:
Surname: Bolland
Name: David James
Address: 26 South Park Avenue, Normanby, Middlesbrough, UK.ZIP code: TS60NS
Mobile UK: 0044(0)7920 460547
E-mail: davidbolland@ymail.com
Skype: davidbolland3@gmail.com
Date of birth (d / m / y): 01 /12 / 1963, 55 years of age
Education / Qualification:
City and Guilds Process Plant Operation Parts 1&2, Longlands College, Middlesbrough. Currently studying for engineering management degree.
Abilities:
- Committed to accomplish tasks safely with efficiency.
- Team player generating a very good environment for work.
- Good coordination and communication skills with different teams from
main contractor, client, customers and vendors.
- Completion of the project from construction phase through to start up, and completion of the
performance test.
- Good knowledge of the documents needed for mechanical completion, precommissioning
and commissioning
- Experienced with ICAPS-Opercom, Go Completions, Petro-IT, Orbit & Zenator completions
Systems.
- Experience in EPC, PMC and Company sponsored projects.
- Good knowledge of developing and reviewing of precommissioning, commissioning and
start-up procedures.
- Experienced in developing commissioning planning with project intergrated planning
schedule.
- Definition of process systems and subsystems.
Experience:
Over 30 years in different facilities including construction, Pre-commissioning, commissioning and start up and operation activities.
Extensive experience with: Refinery, Oil & Gas Plants, Petrochemical Plants, Subsea, Petrochemical and Organic Intermediate Projects.
Training/ Certification:
Emergency Response, Permit to Work, Risk Assessment, Current Bosiet Offshore Survival, Current Norwegian offshore medical including Seaman’s. Fire and Rescue, First Aid, Mechanical & Electrical isolation. Go-Completions foundation, and database course.
Responsibilities during the projects:
-  Definition of Systems & Subsystems, and complete P&ID mark-ups.
-  Participate in project engineering reviews, advising engineering of potencial issues.
-  Coordination of the completions team.
-  Develop the commissioning plan,
-  Develop planning with project to form integrated plan.
-  Review of commissioning spares list.
-  Identify vendor support requirement and integrate into project plan.
-  Review and approval of Contractor’s methods for Pre-commissioning and commissioning.
-  Review and approval of Contractor’s system Commissioning Test Procedures/
Operational Test Procedure (OTPs).
-  Participate in susbsystem walkdowns to achive mechanical completion.
-  Create discipline punch lists, and ensure punch liset liquidation is completed.
-  Ensure all pre-commissioning and commissioning activities are carried out safely in
accordance with the project HSE plan.
-  Completion of functional tests, OTP’s, system leak testing, and purging .
-  Define precommissioning and commissioning /materials/equipment requirements.
-  Participate in system HAZOP’s
-  Participate in the pre-startup safety review (PSSR), prior to the introduction of well fluids
or chemical raw feed stocks.
Employment history:
Septenber 17’ to Present: Exterran, Eastern Hemisphere, Dubai/Muscat,
Tayseer EDF Project, Oman (Sour Gas)
Position: Commissioning Manager.
Pre-commissioning/commissioning preparation activities in readiness for the execution phase, including; system/subsystem definition, systemisation, commissioning sequence, planning, vendor support, population of the completions database and review of engineering, and commissioning documentation. Compile lists for the commissioning tools, testing equipment, consumables, and additional materials required for the commissioning execution. Preparation of the commissioning team mobilisation plan, and onboarding of the discipline leads, supervisors, and technicians. Mobilise to the Tayseer EDF for the execution of the precommissioning, and commissioning activities.
March 17’ to September: Exterran, Eastern Hemisphere, Dubai/Muscat,
Hawqa EDF Project, Oman (Oil and Gas)
Position: Commissioning Manager.
Leading the commissioning team to complete the pre-commissioning/commissioning activities for the Hawqa project. Comm

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
